content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment to be a perfect fit for your needs. How much were you thinking of offering for the monthly rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, considering that the apartment is unfurnished and has a size of 50 square meters, I was thinking of starting with an offer of 600 euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hmm, 600 euros per month is a fair starting point. However, given the prime location and the fact that it's a brand new apartment, I believe we could aim a bit higher. What do you think about 700 euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the location and the condition of the apartment, I understand your offer of 700 euros. However, I am a student and I need to keep my expenses as low as possible. I propose 650 euros as a fair price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: As a landlord, I have to balance my investment with the needs of my tenants. 650 euros is more in line with what I was expecting. If you're willing to pay a security deposit of one month's rent and sign a one-year lease, we have a deal. Is that acceptable to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds fair. I am willing to pay the security deposit and sign the one-year lease. I agree to the price of 650 euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm glad to hear that, Haoyu. Welcome to your new home! Please let me know when you're ready to sign the lease and pay the deposit. We can meet at my office to finalize the paperwork. Thank you for choosing my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for understanding my situation, Mr. Schmidt. I am ready to sign the lease and pay the deposit whenever it's convenient for you.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Excellent, Haoyu. I'll send you an email with the details of my office hours. Please let me know when you're available to come by and we'll get everything sorted out. Again, thank you for renting my apartment, and I hope you enjoy your stay in Munich.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. I look forward to moving into the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: You're welcome, Haoyu. I'm sure you'll be very happy here. If you have any questions or need assistance with anything, please don't hesitate to contact me. Enjoy your new home!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. I appreciate your help and assistance. TERMINATE
name: Haoyu Wang from China
